  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3373</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3373</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Endevina endevinalla</string>
            <string language="en">Riddlemeree</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Riddlemeree</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Riddlemeree</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Riddlemeree</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Riddlemeree</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Riddlemeree</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Recull d'endevinalles que es plantegen a partir d'un text i una pista que consisteix en la imatge d'un detall gràfic de l'element que s'ha d'endevinar.
Les endevinalles estan classificades per blocs (éssers vius, objectes, aliments...) i segons tres nivells de dificultat.</string>
            <string language="en">Selection of riddles based on a text and a visual clue that is part of the object to be guessed. The riddles are grouped in sections (living things, objects, food, etc.) and in three different levels of difficulty.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">atenció</string>
            <string language="en">attention</string>
            <string language="es">atención</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">pensament lògic</string>
            <string language="en">logical thinking</string>
            <string language="es">pensamiento lógico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">percepció</string>
            <string language="en">perception</string>
            <string language="es">percepción</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">lectura</string>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
            <string language="es">lectura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">raonament</string>
            <string language="en">reasoning</string>
            <string language="es">razonamiento</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswahl der Rätsel basiert auf einem Text und 
einem Sichtanhaltspunkt, der ein Teil der geschätzt zu werden ist 
Nachricht. Die Rätsel werden in den Kapiteln gruppiert (lebende
Sachen, Nachrichten, Nahrung, usw..) und in drei 
unterschiedlichen Stufen Schwierigkeit.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sélection des énigmes basées sur un texte et 
un indice visuel qui fait partie de l'objet à deviner. Les 
énigmes sont groupées en sections (choses, objets, nourriture, etc..
de vie.) et dans trois niveaux différents de difficulté.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Seleção dos riddles baseados em um texto e em 
um indício visual que seja parte do objeto a ser suposto. Os 
riddles são agrupados nas seções (coisas, objetos, alimento, etc. 
vivendo.) e em três níveis diferentes da dificuldade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Selezione dei riddles basati su un testo e su un 
indizio visivo che fa parte dell'oggetto da indovinare. I 
riddles sono raggruppati in sezioni (cose, oggetti, alimento, ecc 
viventi.) ed in tre livelli differenti della difficoltà.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιλογή των αινιγμάτων βασισμένων σε ένα κείμενο και 
μια οπτική ένδειξη που είναι μέρος του αντικειμένου που 
υποθέτεται. Τα αινίγματα ομαδοποιούνται στα τμήματα 
(πράγματα διαβίωσης, αντικείμενα, τρόφιμα, κ.λπ....) και σε 
τρία διαφορετικά επίπεδα δυσκολίας.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Aufmerksamkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">logisches Denken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vorstellung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Argumentation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attention</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pensée logique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">perception</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">raisonnement</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">atenção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pensar lógico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">percepção</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">raciocínio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">attenzione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">pensare logico</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">percezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">ragionamento</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προσοχή</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογική σκέψη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αντίληψη</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάγνωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">συλλογισμός</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
